long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your coding potential with the Code Snippet Manager, a Chrome extension specifically designed to boost the productivity and organization of developers at all levels. Whether you're just starting out or you're a seasoned professional, this tool offers an intuitive way to manage and streamline your coding practices right from your browser.

Key Features:

Effortless Snippet Saving: Easily save valuable code snippets from any webpage or input them manually. When you highlight text, our smart detection checks if it's code and offers a convenient popup to save it directly to your manager.

Automated Tagging: Our extension automatically recognizes the programming language of your highlighted code and tags it accordingly. This feature simplifies categorization and speeds up retrieval.

Advanced Search Capabilities: Quickly find exactly what you need with searches based on title, code content, or tags. Our powerful search functionality ensures that no code is ever more than a few clicks away.

Seamless Link Sharing: Generate and share Pastebin links with ease. Whether you're collaborating with a colleague or sharing your work for feedback, our link-sharing feature makes it straightforward and hassle-free.

Enhance your coding efficiency today. Add the Code Snippet Manager to your toolkit and transform how you save, categorize, access, and share code snippets—all without ever leaving your browser!
